name: User verifies config show output via CLI
description:
- Login with valid credentials via **UI**.
- Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
- Login with Bearer auth token via **CLI**.
- Create first organization via **CLI**.
- Run `apolo config show` command via **CLI**.

### Verify that:

- `apolo config show` command output is valid.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials via UI.
  • Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
  • Login with Bearer auth token via CLI.
  • Create first organization via CLI.
  • Run apolo config show command via CLI.

Verify that:

  • apolo config show command output is valid.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Run config show command via CLI
Message: Your root certificates are out of date.
You are using certifi 2025.7.14, however 2025.8.3 is available.
Please consider upgrading certifi package, e.g.:
    python -m pip install --upgrade certifi
or
    conda update certifi

ERROR: Not enough permissions ({"missing": [{"uri": "cluster://default/users/regression-sxufo45xyz", "action": "read"}]})
statusTrace:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/cli_steps/comonent_steps_impl/config_steps.py:48: in cli_show_config
    assert result, error_message
           ^^^^^^
E   AssertionError: Your root certificates are out of date.
E   You are using certifi 2025.7.14, however 2025.8.3 is available.
E   Please consider upgrading certifi package, e.g.:
E       python -m pip install --upgrade certifi
E   or
E       conda update certifi
E   
E   ERROR: Not enough permissions ({"missing": [{"uri": "cluster://default/users/regression-sxufo45xyz", "action": "read"}]})

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/test_cases/tests_cli/test_organization_structure_setup.py:119: in test_config_show_output_cli
    await self._cli_steps.config.cli_show_config()
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:58: in wrapper
    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
E   AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Run config show command via CLI
E   Message: Your root certificates are out of date.
E   You are using certifi 2025.7.14, however 2025.8.3 is available.
E   Please consider upgrading certifi package, e.g.:
E       python -m pip install --upgrade certifi
E   or
E       conda update certifi
E   
E   ERROR: Not enough permissions ({"missing": [{"uri": "cluster://default/users/regression-sxufo45xyz", "action": "read"}]})
